main event: A bright reddish-white object was observed changing to bright orange while climbing to the west and then descending, with no trail observed.
interesting points: The object was first seen as bright reddish-white and changed to bright orange., The observation lasted for 5-10 minutes., The source of the sighting was military personnel., The object's light intensity was estimated to be between 10,000 to 12,000., The object exploded just before hitting cloud tops estimated at 12,000 to 13,000 feet.
sighted object: a bright reddish-white object changing to bright orange
